doc.field: Material related to Spadafora's firefighter exam prep book circa 2005-08, including 1) Personal: check stub, contracts, author guide from McGraw-Hill, emails about project, etc. and 2) technical reference material: FDNY probationary firefighters manual chapters and other training bulletins, list of informational resources, NYC's Firefighting training manual (1977), exam prep and info from other cities (e.g., Denver, San Antonio), 1999-2008, Will Chapleau's book on emergency first responders with tearsheets and other inserts, material on memory and visualization. Binder: FDNY Division 6: Lightweight Residential One to Four Family Homes procedures (2000). Accordion folder labeled "Fire Dynamics Simulations" with 33 CDs (many duplicates), including Report of The Station Nightclub Fire (2005), fire at 3146 Cherry Rd in Washington DC (2000), fire in one story restaurant, Texas (2000), two story duplex, Iowa (1999), impact of sprinklers on various materials, other technical subjects, and flashover and other Powerpoints by Chief Galvin (2007). (Includes digital formats)
